remarks: Lemma for ~ cvrexch .  ( ~ cvexchlem analog.)  (Contributed by NM, 18-Nov-2011.)
statement:
cvrexch.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
cvrexch.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
cvrexch.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
cvrexch.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
cvrexchlem $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( ( X ./\ Y ) C Y -> X C ( X .\/ Y ) ) ) $.
